name: Flip Ball: Hit And Merge Color
name_original: Flip Ball: Hit And Merge Color
description:
FLIP BALL is a brand new match 3 puzzle game with a twist! Once you start you won't be able to stop.

HOW TO PLAY
Balls of different colors are falling down from the top. You have to merge and match 3 balls of the same color by rotating and spinning the center on witch the falling balls sticks.

FEATURES
• Addictive and innovative game play that will challenge your brain and reactions.
• Special combos and busters will help you progress in the game.
• The game is suitable for kids of all ages.

Don’t waist any more time and download the game for FREE today and start playing with your friends to see who gets the highest score.
Have fun and enjoy the game!
